sentences.sContent: The suspense over the two remaining hostages ended last night when the police discovered the bullet ridden bodies.
sentences.sCn: 有关剩下两名人质的悬念在昨晚警方发现布满弹孔的尸体后结束了。

synos.tran: 悬念；悬疑；焦虑；悬而不决

words.tran: 悬浮的；暂停的，缓期的（宣判）
悬疑的；令人紧张的；焦急不安的
暂停的；悬而不决的；可疑的；暧昧的
悬吊的；暂时中止的；支持的
[植] 胚柄；囊柄；悬带；吊绷带
延缓，推迟；使暂停；使悬浮；vi. 悬浮；禁赛

trans.tranOther: Suspense is a state of excitement or anxiety about something that is going to happen very soon, for example about some news that you are waiting to hear
